ch0090_10_daigo/0101_0701_02_10:
Shall we go exploring to satisfy our
inquisitive minds?
ch0090_10_daigo/7101_0701_01_10:
Did you know that Deoxys is the result of the
sudden mutation of a space virus?
ch0090_10_daigo/7101_0701_02_10:
That means that Deoxys originally comes from
somewhere in space—far, far beyond the sky we
see above us.
ch0090_10_daigo/7101_0701_03_10:
It’s hard to even imagine things on such an
enormous scale!
ch0090_10_daigo/7102_0701_01_10:
The sparkling stars are so romantic—and
deeply mysterious.
ch0090_10_daigo/7102_0701_02_10:
I think that’s why, ever since long ago, people
have always been fascinated by outer space.
ch0090_10_daigo/7102_0701_03_10:
How about you? Are you a fan of outer space?
If so, I can show you around the space center in
Mossdeep City.
ch0090_10_daigo/7103_0701_01_10:
I’ve heard that the crystalline organ on Deoxys’s
chest is actually its brain.
ch0090_10_daigo/7103_0701_02_10:
That enchanting sparkle is so beautiful, don’t you
think? It’s dangerously alluring.
ch0090_10_daigo/7103_0701_03_10:
But even a true rock enthusiast like me wouldn’t
dream of trying to get that crystal for myself!
ch0090_10_daigo/7104_0701_01_10: Deoxys is capable of changing into different forms.
ch0090_10_daigo/7104_0701_02_10:
Its strength lies in being able to adapt to
its surroundings.
ch0090_10_daigo/7105_0701_01_10: In this sygna suit, I match Deoxys’s look!
ch0090_10_daigo/7105_0701_02_10: It’s such a sleek and futuristic design.
ch0090_10_daigo/7105_0701_03_10:
What do you think, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
I’d like to hear your opinion.
ch0090_10_daigo/1701_0701_01_10: Hey there. Would you please take this?
ch0090_10_daigo/1701_0702_01_10:
It fell suddenly from the sky—a gift from the
universe to you!
ch0090_10_daigo/1701_0702_02_10: *chuckle* Actually, it’s a present from me.
ch0090_10_daigo/2501_0701_01_10:
Some of the rarest minerals on the planet actually
exist in abundance out in space.
ch0090_10_daigo/2501_0701_02_10: That’s true about a lot of things.
ch0090_10_daigo/2501_0701_03_10:
It would be so helpful if we could gather some of
those minerals from space.
ch0090_10_daigo/2501_0702_01_10:
Having a bigger source of useful minerals would
be a good thing, of course, but...
ch0090_10_daigo/2501_0702_02_10:
For a rock maniac like me, it would be sad to see
the minerals lose value as they become less
scarce. It’s a complicated feeling.
ch0090_10_daigo/2501_0702_03_10: But minerals have more appeal than just rarity!
ch0090_10_daigo/2511_0701_01_10:
We humans grow and mature, but we don’t tend
to change our appearances as drastically as
Pokémon do.
ch0090_10_daigo/2511_0701_02_10:
Maybe that’s why we learned to enjoy different
clothes and fashion.
ch0090_10_daigo/2511_0702_01_10:
Why don’t you try dressing up in some new
styles yourself?
ch0090_10_daigo/2511_0702_02_10: I’d really love to see a totally new look for you!
ch0090_10_daigo/3001_0701_01_10:
Hm... I’ve been lost in thought all morning.
I don’t suppose it’s a bad thing, though, is it?
ch0090_10_daigo/3003_0701_01_10:
The world is full of mysteries. There’s still much
fun to be had in chasing them.
ch0090_10_daigo/3005_0701_01_10:
Did you battle with everything you’ve got? And
did you think it over after? Good. Then it’s time
for a break.
